item.description:
Come down to the Perishable Theater on Empire St. and enjoy a late-night evening of Puppet Theater!

Puppets are cool!!!!! So I've always had a little thing about puppets and so can't miss the opportunity to check out this group in action. I have no idea what to expect since I've never seen them, but really, how can puppets and storytelling be bad? Well, we'll find out............

http://www.perishable...

This is also a Newcomers event and Matt can't make it, so I'm hosting for both. We'll meet at the bar at AS220 at 9:30 and walk down the street to the theater at 9:45. The show starts at 10pm and everyone is responsible for their own tickets, so pick them up before or at the door.

http://www.as220.org/...

Hope to see you there!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'l be wearing the fuzzy blue scarf!
item.name: Blood from a Turnip - Late Night Puppet Theater!
